name: Fiserv Incorporated
legal: Publicly-traded company (please note that Fiserv Incorporated acquired First Data Corporation on July 29, 2019)
membership: European Payment Institutions Federation, American Chamber of Commerce to the EU
goal: Fiserv enables innovative financial services experiences that are in step with the way that people live and work today. It delivers innovative payment technology and services solutions. Our company is anchored in the EU and works with clients in 20 Member States. Fiserv's engagement with EU institutions seeks to promote growth across the EU market.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, Cross-Border and Currency Conversion Fee Regulation, implementation of the revised Payment Services Directive (PSD2), revision of the Interchange Fee Regulation, implementation of the General Data Protection Regulation
